from ENT_SUPPLIER_V

mapper.insert: insert into ENT_SUPPLIER_V (SUPPLIER_ID, SUPPLIER_CODE, SUPPLIER_DESCR, CONTACT1, CONTACT2, PHONE1, PHONE2, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, FAX, EMAIL, ACTIVE, REMARK, COMPANY_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_VERSION, DESCRIPTION ) values (#{supplierId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=CHAR} )
